summary:
Over 30y experiences in offshore wind and energy industries including  

o At both management and expert positions in areas of Quality management (e.g. Lead Quality Advisor, Q Director, Q Manager–Product Line, Team lead Project Q –EMEA, Sr.Q Engineer, QHSE Manager, TQM Manager, Q Engineer, Inspection Coordinator), Project management (e.g. Project Manager, Project Engineer, Engineering Manager., Interface Manager., Material Manager), Information management (e.g. Sr.IM consultant, IM Manager), Contracting & Procurement (e.g. Contract Manager, Procurement Lead), and Mechanical engineering (e.g. Sr./Lead Engineer, Package lead) 

o Exposure to full spectrum of project activities of DDE, Development (Feasibility study, Concept design/FEED, ITT), Construction (EPC, EPCi, reimbursable),  and Operation in Europe, Asia, Africa, and Americas

o Recent experiences (5y) with full spectrum exposure to offshore wind projects in Europe (5x) and Asia (4x)

o Working at international and multi-culture business environment with companies of  TPC-Foxwell (via IX Wind), CIP-COP (via Lautec), Orsted, Shell, Aker, ABB, Fluor

o Result-oriented and hands-on personality with strong analytical and organizational capability of developing and driving fit-for-purpose solutions and continuous improvement in highly dynamics and complex business environments. 

Current career focus is on consulting and execution services in quality management, information management, supply chain management, and project management for the offshore wind industry and projects; with sufficient international mobility and flexibility in duration; passionating about work which contribute to a more carbon neutral world.
